# Changelog

## 1.1.1 - 2021-03-11
* Fix for payload parameters with a zero value

## 1.1.0 - 2021-03-08
* Add Refunds API
* Add Card update
* Add sort parameters to custom payment signature generation
* Update Onsite not available in sandbox mode

## 1.0.1 - 2021-03-03
* Passphrase bug fix

## 1.0.0 - 2020-11-23
* Initial Release
